com.adidas.connect.ui.fragment.listener

Interface InputStepListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditAddressActivity, EditDateOfBirthActivity, EditGenderActivity, EditNameActivity, EditProfileActivity, NewInputStepsActivity, SetPasswordActivity, StandaloneEditFieldActivity

    public interface InputStepListener
    Listener that must be implemented by the activity which holds the out of focus and focus logic. We are using this listener for three main purposes: 1. Communication from the OutOfFocusStepFragment and from the FocusInputStepFragment with the container activity. Just get the InputStep to draw. 2. Pass the arguments within fragments. 3. Allow to the InputStep to notify to the activity that it can move to the next item.
